import { Avatar, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import React from 'react'; import './Chat.css'; import { AttachFile, MoreVert, SearchOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons'; import InsertEmoticonIcon from "@material-ui/icons/InsertEmoticon" function Chat() { return (
{/* Defines components in the chat header */}
{/* Room name and last seen at */}

Room name

Last seen at...

{/* Three buttons on the right of chat header */}

Sonny This is a message {new Date().toUTCString()}

Sonny This is a message {new Date().toUTCString()}

) } export default Chat
